name: Boka Robi
description:
Behind The Screens

So, these four finally meet to create the ultimate video game after f-ing around for a year. Very tragically, one of them couldnt complete his tasks. What do the other three do? 

They call him with respectful adjectives (used as victory sfx). free salt in wound! but we just joking ;) (added for legal purposes)

So they goofify the game o_O and call it a day :) Effort equivalent of putting lipstick on a pig. But hey, at least they now funny UwU

This is the by-product of a high-stakes project made by low-iq friends/gamedevs. It may not have been the epic game they had planned, but it definitely gave them something to joke about for years to come. (.)(.)

Controls

WASD - Move; Space - Jump

Developers

Made with ♥ by: letsbecool, aliensfromearth, frank06n, cybernerd
